name: AnjaliGupta
body:
# About ME
>> I am a Statistician by profession. I have a Masters from University of Oxford. Have worked on a range of analytical problems such as short term & medium term demand forecasting, forecasting tomorrow's market price for power utilities across India, customer behavior analysis and market trend analysis using Market Sensitivity for increased customer retention and enhanced product marketing and several other financial services projects.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
